name: timeline
description: Fast git-based snapshot tool powered by Bun

scripts.build:cli: mkdir -p bin && bun build src/cli.ts src/timeline-core.ts src/view.ts --compile --outfile bin/timeline
scripts.build:linux: mkdir -p bin && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile bin/timeline-linux
scripts.build:windows: mkdir -p bin && bun build src/cli.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile bin/timeline.exe
scripts.test:integration: echo 'Integration tests in test/cli.test.ts require subprocess spawning'
